¶ Therefore thou shalt speak<WH559> unto them this word<WH1697>; Thus saith<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Every bottle<WH5035> shall be filled<WH4390> with wine<WH3196>: and they shall say<WH559> unto thee, Do we not certainly<WH3045> know<WH3045> that every bottle<WH5035> shall be filled<WH4390> with wine<WH3196>?
